EmailTemplate.description: Evite sent for Worcester Western Mass Lunch
EmailTemplate.name: Worcester/Western Mass Lunch 2006
EmailTemplate.subject: ASA Invites Worcester & Western Mass Clients to Lunch
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
American Student AssistanceÂ® invites you to a celebration in honor of our Worcester and Western Massachusetts clients.
Where: Webster House, One Webster Street, Worcester, MA 01603
When: February 17, 2006, 12:00 to 3:00 p.m
Entree Choices:
1. Roast Rump of Choice Beef, Au Jus
2. Baked Stuffed Shrimp
3. Broiled Marinated Chicken Breast
Please email your client manager to confirm your entree choice.
For more information about Webster House, visit www.websterhouseweb.com
